Text: Thanks!I remember He-Man when I was a kid..now all I know of him is that weird youtube video haha

lol i remember as a kid i once refused to leave the electronics section of a department store because i was watching he-man on the wall of television sets...

the major difference is that in 2013, teela is dressing like a huge ho!
What i remember about He-Man is Dolph Lundgren and She-Ra......OMG i am soooooo old :-)
dolph lundgren? you mean that guy from the expendables?? he was in movies before that?!? lol just kidding, just kidding. wow masters of the universe, what a movie...
thanks STFmaryville for sharing this comic book....really brings out some nostalgia....
Thanks! I'm confused though, as last year also, they released this same title and I have issues 1-6. So they rebooted the series again this year?

yeah, last year's series was always going to be a 6-issue miniseries. this is meant to be an ongoing series, although if it lasts 6 issues or more... that's anyone's guess.

if you missed it, you should also grab the 8-issue MotU digital exclusive comic that came out last year. it was also written by giffen and featured adora (as an agent of hordak), as does this series.
I see. Glad they decided to start a regular series with it. And yes, I did get the MOTU series last year too.
